Header.title: PepeFork ($PORK)
Header.paragraph: Official Fork of $PEPE, the People's Token. Born January 30, 2024.

About.paragraph: Due to disappointment and mistrust of the core $PEPE team, the Pond0x community has taken matter into its own hands. Pauly0x created $PORK to deliver wins to the people.
Why: Best holder distribution (No Whales own over 2.5%)
